content.en: AI Governance Analysis: Researchers have analyzed a set of scientific abstracts to understand the state of artificial intelligence (AI) governance globally. They have explored various research questions, such as the role of government regulation in AI ethics, the challenges and modalities of AI governance, and the perception of AI technology and its governance. The analysis highlights the agency of algorithms in areas like overviewing current AI governance activities, developing frameworks for AI regulation, and identifying incentives for implementing AI governance programs.
content.da: Analyse af AI-styring: Forskere har analyseret et sæt videnskabelige abstracts for at forstå tilstanden af kunstig intelligens (AI) styring globalt. De har udforsket forskellige forskningsspørgsmål, såsom regeringens regulerings rolle i AI-etik, udfordringerne og modaliteterne ved AI-styring, samt opfattelsen af AI-teknologi og dens styring. Analysen fremhæver algoritmers rolle i områder som at give overblik over nuværende AI-styringsaktiviteter, udvikle rammer for AI-regulering og identificere incitamenter for implementering af AI-styringsprogrammer.
